Package org.drools.definition

All classes to create definitions, as built by the KnowledgeBuilder from artifact resources, can be found here.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
KnowledgeDefinition Marker interface for all KnowlegeDefinition's
KnowledgeDescr A top level interface for Knowledge Descriptors.
KnowledgePackage This provides a collection of knowledge definitions that can be given to a KnowledgeBase.
 

Enum Summary
KnowledgeDefinition.KnowledgeType  
 

Package org.drools.definition Description

All classes to create definitions, as built by the KnowledgeBuilder from artifact resources, can be found here.
